forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 27F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
